headline: DoorDash Deliveroo Deal Reshapes Global Platform And Valuation Story
summary: DoorDash, listed as NasdaqGS:DASH, has completed its £2.9b acquisition of Deliveroo. The deal expands DoorDash's presence in Europe and adds Deliveroo's network to its platform. The company is using the acquisition to push further into grocery, retail, and autonomous delivery. For you as an investor, this transaction reshapes how DoorDash participates in on demand commerce, moving further beyond restaurant orders into a wider mix of services. It also gives the company a broader...
